#summary &boxhd; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesB

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesB B] > &boxhd;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&boxHD;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2566/index.htm U+02566].
  * `&boxHd;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2564/index.htm U+02564].
  * `&boxhD;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2565/index.htm U+02565].
  * `&boxhd;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/252c/index.htm U+0252C].
